definition: to search everywhere/to search high and low/to comb
to try to find/to look for/to call on sb/to find/to seek/to return/to give change
everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time
variant of 遍[bian4]

sentences.english: She looks all over her house for it.
sentences.chinese: 她找遍了她房子的每一个角落。

sentences.english: He searched the room only to find nothing.
sentences.chinese: 他找遍房间，结果什么也没有找到。

sentences.english: E. g. I've searched all over the shop for my book , but in vain.
sentences.chinese: 我找遍了所有的地方，就是找不到我的书。

sentences.english: I've searched every nook and cranny but can't find the button I lost.
sentences.chinese: 我角角落落都找遍了，还是没找到丢失的钮扣。

sentences.english: I've looked all over the house for them.
The next morning Archer scoured the town in vain for yellow roses.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上，阿切尔找遍了全城也没找到黄攻瑰。

sentences.english: He looked everywhere for the book except in the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 除了卧室以外，为找那本书他到处都找遍了。

sentences.english: The couple (searched) the whole street(for) their lost child.
sentences.chinese: 这对夫妇为了他们丢失的小孩找遍了整条街。

sentences.english: I tell my boy he must not get lost again.
sentences.chinese: 我找遍了所有地方，但是，我找不到他。

sentences.english: looked for it everywhere, but I still can't find it.
sentences.chinese: 到处都找遍了，但我仍然没有找到它。

sentences.english: Therefore I pray thee come with me, for over the whole world have I wandered in search of thee.
sentences.chinese: 我一直祈祷着你能回到我身边，为此我找遍了全世界。

sentences.english: The tourist searched the whole town but could not find a fruit -shop open .
sentences.chinese: 那个游客找遍了全镇但是没有发现有一家水果店开门。

sentences.english: I have looked everywhere upstairs and downstairs.
sentences.chinese: 我楼上楼下哪儿都找遍了。

sentences.english: We've looked everywhere. We've found nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经找遍了所有的地方，什么也没找到。

sentences.english: The next morning he searched the hills for her.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上，他找遍了所有的山丘。

definition: to rummage through/to turn everything over/to ransack
to go everywhere/to scour (the whole town)
to find (sth one has been looking for)
to gain nothing/to end up empty-handed
to find
trace/vestige/presence
to make uniform/to even up/to make good a deficiency
whereabouts unknown/gone missing
to have disappeared/to be missing/nowhere to be found
to search/to look for
not a soul in sight (idiom)
upside down/upturned
(not) a single person/(no) one
to investigate
to search/to look for/to seek
to overturn trunks and boxes/to make a thorough search (idiom)
